items.question: How does Datai AI Data Assistant work?
items.answer: Datai AI Data Assistant uses advanced artificial intelligence technology to help users quickly process and analyze large amounts of data. It can automatically identify data types, provide intelligent cleaning and transformation functions, and generate intuitive visual reports.

items.question: Do I need programming knowledge to use Datai AI Data Assistant?
items.answer: No. Datai AI Data Assistant is designed to be very user-friendly, and even users without programming experience can easily get started. We provide an intuitive interface and guided operations to make data processing simple and easy to understand.

items.question: What data formats does Datai AI Data Assistant support?
items.answer: We support a variety of common data formats, including but not limited to Excel, CSV, JSON, XML, etc. In addition, we also support direct connections to various databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.

items.question: How is data security ensured?
items.answer: Data security is our top priority. All data processing is done locally and will not be uploaded to the cloud. We use advanced encryption technology to protect your data and provide security measures such as multi-factor authentication.

items.question: Do you provide enterprise customization services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide enterprise-level customization services. Our team can develop customized data processing solutions based on your specific needs, including local deployment, API integration, exclusive training, and other services.
